page.shortlink: api client api string extractfragment method

argument.name: instance
argument.description: The zero base index of the fragment to extract.

argument.name: separator
argument.description: The string or regular expression to use as the boundary of the fragments. An array of two strings and/or regular expressions can be passed in to define a separate start and end boundary.

page.description: Extension to the native string variable to support extraction of string fragments.

discussion.p: The String.extractFragment method can be used to extract fragments of text from a string.
The "instance" argument is the index of the fragment to return.
The optional "separator" argument is the string(s) and/or regular expression(s) to use as the boundaries of the fragments. By default the separators are white-space and punctuation characters.
